translations: n.动物园（zoo 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Children come to zoos precisely to see captive animals.
sentences.translation: 孩子们到动物园来正是为了看那些被关起来的动物。

sentences.sentence: The animals are captured in nets and sold to local zoos.
sentences.translation: 那些动物用网捕获后被卖到当地的动物园。

sentences.sentence: Zoos have all kinds of animals.
